anathuruwa sudassana maha swamindrayan wahanse saha werahara nandasara swamindrayan wahanse sihipath kala yuthu ya.esamayehi mema arame pawathiye mal pahan pidimata bodhi rajayanan wahanse, dharma deshana kirima sandaha mahal thunakin samanwitha pol athu sewili kala dharma shalawa, uposathagaraya ha kamara dekakin samanwitha kuda aawasa geya pamanak bawa ithihasaya wimasa balime di pahadili wanu atha.pasu kaleka kuda buddha mandirayak da idi karawa anuradhapura buduruwa kanda wiharasthanaye sita wadama karawana lada shailamaya buddha prathima wahansela denamak ek prathima wahanse namak thanpath kota chithra karma nimawa nethra prathisthapanaya kara thibe.werahara nandasara mahimiyange apawathwimen pasu unwahansege shishya pethigamuwe rahula himiyan 1980 warshaye wiharadhipathithwayata pathwiya.

unusum puwath wartha nowu mema sathiye wipaksha nayaka ranil wikramasinha mahatha athulu bohomayak deshapalanagnyayan wideshagatha wi sitiyaha.dakunu aprikawe nila sancharayakata ekwa siti ti. en. ee. sanwidhana niyojitha pirisa pasugiya sikurada meratata paminiye ya. aar. sambandhan, em. ee. sumandiran, maweyi senadhiraja, suresh premachandra, selwam adekkalanadan mahathwaru dakunu aprikanu janadhipathi jekob suma mahathage wishesha niyojitha meposa samanga dakunu aprikawe pritoriyawaladi dirgha lesa sakachcha kaleya.ehi prathipalayak lesa meposa mayi aga shri lankawata paminimata niyamitha athara ohu uthure sancharayaka nirathawimatath drawida jathika sandhanaye ha rajaye atharamadiyek lesa kriya kirimata ekanga wiya. ti. en. ee. sanwidhanaye parshwakaruwan wana plot ha telo aadi paksha owunge niyojithayan dakunu aprikanu sancharayata ekkara noganima sambandhayen aar.
